channel.title: CVE Feed for SEUR -- SEUR plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SEUR -- SEUR plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-9201|2024-10-10T13:52:51.793Z -- seur -- seur%20plugin
item.description: The SEUR plugin, in its versions prior to 2.5.11, is vulnerable to time-based SQL injection through the use of the ‘id_order’ parameter of the ‘/modules/seur/ajax/saveCodFee.php’ endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2024-9201|2024-10-10T10:25:50.915Z -- seur -- seur%20plugin
item.description: The SEUR plugin, in its versions prior to 2.5.11, is vulnerable to time-based SQL injection through the use of the ‘id_order’ parameter of the ‘/modules/seur/ajax/saveCodFee.php’ endpoint.
